comment.author: 53133240@N00
comment._content: I collect early postcards of women playing sports, including baseball. You can see some of the images here: www.eduwrite.com/baseball.html One excellent resource for information about various players is this one: www.exploratorium.edu/baseball/girlsofsummer.html

comment.author: 38095153@N06
comment._content: Wow.  How times have changed.  How in the world did this woman play baseball in a dress?  Can you imagine sliding in a dress?  The only thing that even resembles baseball in this day and age is the bat.  Although extremely different, it amazes me that women were allowed to play baseball in 1911.
